name: Secretary Simulator
description:
A game idea prototype from a recent 48 hr game jam with some fellow students. 

~

Theme: Secretary

Genre: Multiplayer

~

Our basic idea was based around the difficult controls of Surgeon Simulator.

~

CONTROLS

Player 1

Arrow Keys/ WASD - MOVEMENT

Left Shift/ Q - RAISE HAND

Z/ E - LOWER HAND

Space - GRAB and DROP

Player 2 (Controller)

Left Stick - MOVEMENT

X - RAISE HAND

Y - LOWER HAND

A - GRAB

B - DROP
